job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: position data analystltbrgtduration monthsltbrgtlocation new york ny remote as of now may go hybrid when office reopensltbrgtpay rate hr on wltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtjob descriptionltbrgt years professional experience and comfort working with large data sets requiredltbrgtproficiency in tableau sql microsoft excel and powerpoint are requiredltbrgtexperience with traditional tv and digital measurement adobe highly preferredltbrgtbachelors degree or equivalent in marketing communications economics statistics or related fieldltbrgtattention to detail accuracy organization strong problemsolving skills and exceptional work ethic are essentialltbrgtable to communicate complex ideas stories and datasets graphically as well as verballyltbrgtability to collaborate and work closely with other parts of the business as well as external partnersltbrgtcapable of prioritizing multiple projects and adhoc requests while thriving in a fastpaced environmentltbrgtselfstarter resourceful flexible proactive amp a true teamplayer who is willing to pitch in wherever neededltbrgtpassion for the entertainment industry and television programmingltbrgt
